item.title: Glue spilt down alleyway, 23rd September
item.description:
A large tub of glue has been emptied and spilt up the alleyway - this happened on Sunday as we saw the bottle and was going to remove it after our dog walk but when e came back some kids had chucked and emptied it all over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Lockesley Drive, Poverest, London

item.title: Abandoned and untaxed, 23rd September
item.description:
This car has been parked here for about 3 months, the tax expired in July. When it arrived the offside front wheel was a space saver and the rear offside had a shredded tyre. The rear wheel is now also fitted with a space saver, rendering the vehicle unroadworthy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Genesta Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Apples On Footway, 23rd September
item.description:
Resident called report apples which are all over footway. Her and her neighbours have to take in turns to clean them up and her garden waste bin ends up getting fill up with them. Today while clean them up she fell and twisted her wrist. Please can we inspect and advise caller has she also has elderly mother and a disabled auntie and she concerned for their safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Blendon Drive, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
